title: Will the Red Wave Reach New England?
itunes:title: Will the Red Wave Reach New England?
description:
New England has 33 members of Congress, and right now every single one is a Democrat. But General Don Bolduc is on the brink of changing that, as he is on the brink of a dramatic upset of Senator Maggie Hassan in New Hampshire. Gen. Bolduc talks to Charlie about the race and Mitch McConnell's inexcusable failure to support him in the home stretch. Plus, Maryland gubernatorial candidate Dan Cox joins to lay out his plan for fixing some of the highest taxes, worst schools, and deadliest crime rates in the nation.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
